0.Description: Average cycle time calculated from the first to the last event

1.Description: Median cycle time calculated from the first to the last event

2.Description: Average cycle time between two events of interest to the user
2.SIGNAL_code:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name ILIKE ${end_events})))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${start_events}))))
   )

3.Description: Average cycle time for all currently open cases
3.SIGNAL_code:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) - FIRST(end_time))) FILTER (
		WHERE (SELECT FIRST(event_name) FILTER (
			WHERE event_name IN (${closing_events}))) IS NULL
   )

4.Description: Comparison between planned and actual average cycle time: when > 1 then the actual cycle time is smaller than that planned

5.Description: Percentage of cases executed in less than a given time threshold
